channel.title: PullRequests on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in PullRequests on Codewrecks

item.title: Azure DevOps: importance of stable tests in pull requests
item.description: Pull Requests are the heartbeat of a project, and it is probably one of the reason to move to Git if you still are in a different source control. Actually a Pull Requests introduce this enormous advantage in a team You know when a feature/bugfix branch is ready to be inspected by the team A single place of discussion Automatic Merge and tests run on merge result Etc. Actually you have a lots of other advantages, but I want to concentrate the attention on test run.
